subSections.instruction: Check the following information system tools:

subSections.title: Section D. mRDT Observations

inputRows.label: Does this facility have this testing site?
What was cadre of the health service provider observed?
Has the observed provider received training on mRDT
Patient correctly identified and procedure explained to the patient/caregiver
Device correctly labelled with patient's name
Finger disinfected and allowed to dry before pricking
New sterile lancet used for each patient
Used lancet disposed immediately in appropriate sharps container
Right amount of blood collected with the blood transfer device
All collected blood deposited in correct well
Correct number of buffer drops deposited in correct well
Device correctly labelled with starting and ending time
Used test store in appropriate container
Capillary tube disposed in appropriate container
Alcohol swab disposed in appropriate container
roper timing observed before reading test results (according to kit instruction)
Result recorded accurately in the register
Result recorded accurately on the patient's card/book/form

subSections.instruction: Instructions: Supervisor for mRDT will observe competency in all the 3 testing sites

sections.title: Section E. mRDT register Data Consistency Check
sections.instruction: Choose the most recent three months from mRDT Malaria register and malaria case register for positive cases and write the values in each of the blank box. Compare the values as directed in the table below. Give 2 point for each of the matching numbers

sections.title: Section F. mRDT QC System
sections.instruction: Instructions: Answer the question below for the sites testing for mRDT

inputRows.label: Does this facility have this testing site? If yes....
Are used mRDT devices retained the last quarter? Verify
Are retained mRDT devices stored in separate QC boxes*?
Are the QC boxes labelled according to the month?

subSections.title: F.2 Verified Devices According to SOPS

inputRows.label: Test device with a white/colorless reading zone

subSections.instruction: Randomly select 100 retained used mRDT cassettes (if facility has less than 100 take all), assess and write the number and percentage of correct performance on the following.
